attributes.action: Allow fishing on rivers during the close season from now until the 15/06/2020.
attributes.additional_details: To enable fishing on all rivers to help with social distancing and encourage people to get outside in relative isolation during these exceptional times.
attributes.background: This should be an immediate relaxation of the coarse fishing close season on all uk rivers.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition the Government has said that everyone should stay at home and avoid non-essential travel. The Angling Trust have advised that fishing is not included in the permitted activities and anglers should refrain from fishing at present. You can read more here: https://www.anglingtrust.net/news.asp?section=29&sectionTitle=Angling+Trust+News&itemid=5240

We could accept a petition to abolish the closed season in general, if this is something you would like to happen.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
